title: PBE Signups
body: I signed up for a PBE account a long time ago and recently I decided I wanted to try joining PBE again. When I went to go click to become a tester I skipped applications and went straight for testing and was never able to sign up for a PBE account. I can not apply again and can not create another PBE account. Does anyone know how to fix this or how I can reapply?

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I see you already have an active PBE account so it's not possible to apply for another.  If you need assistance recovering your PBE account, we can help with that!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we'll respond asap!
